entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -33.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
